plot: 5 criminals escape when a prison bus overturns in the Tianshan mountains. The Public Security Bureau pursues them.
title: Xue jian Jialaman
plot_es: 5 criminals escape when a prison bus overturns in the Tianshan mountains. The Public Security Bureau pursues them.
plot_en: 5 criminals escape when a prison bus overturns in the Tianshan mountains. The Public Security Bureau pursues them.
